recommendations: Ben Knight ‚ÄúRitu is one of the most brilliant and effective Agile people I've been fortunately to meet or work with! Her intuition, Agile instincts and keen insight on all things 'people' would be enough to recommend her alone, but Ritu backs this up with a diligent work ethic that gives the impression that she leaves no stone unturned in her pursuit of the best solution for the team she's working with. For me personally, having someone as creative and easy to bounce ideas around with as Ritu has been invaluable. She balances an effective balance of radical candour with curiosity and always being open to listening and learning something new. It's a certainty to say that there are many systems and processes at Peak that wouldn't be the same at Peak without her input, but to own the truth, he impact goes far further than that and is difficult to truly capture in words. If you get the opportunity to work with Ritu, I could not advise you more strongly to take it with both hands and enjoy that good decision again and again thereafter.‚Äù

Kritika S. ‚ÄúRitu is one of the most competent people I've evermet. She is a gifted and ambitious young woman. You could throw any problem at her and she'd come up with the greatest solutions; I trusted her with all the confidential matters throughout my time at peak . I couldn't think of a better person to receive the Rising Star award at the very organization. she would be an asset to any firm I can't wait to collaborate with her again.‚Äù
